item.title: New Takes on Girl with a Pearl Earring, an Ancient Bronze Returns to Turkey, and the Gold Toilet Whodunit
item.description: In the news are smiles in The Hague and tears in Cleveland. Plus where did 227 pounds of gold go?

item.title: The FBI Raided Her Home by Mistake. Will the Supreme Court Provide Justice?
item.description: Denied appeal by lower courts for a SWAT raid gone wrong at her house, Atlanta mom Trina Martin now seeks recompense at the nation’s highest court.

item.title: A Good Start by Tulsi Gabbard
item.description: She got the first big thing right: protecting our technology industry and all Americans from the Luddite demands of Britain’s Labour government.

item.title: Daniel Patrick Moynihan’s Unheeded Warning About the Collapse of the Black Family
item.description: The marriage culture and family structure that long sustained the black community continues to become a thing of the past.

item.title: Stop Blaming America First. Europe Lost the War
item.description: Americans, knowing in their bones that democracy and republican government can be imperiled by global affinities, are naturally pulling away in disgus...
